about_the_game:
“Devilish Temptation” is a visual novel for adults only. Naive guy Rob goes to purgatory to save his beloved. But the true test is not the gloomy subterranean depths, but seductive demonesses who are ready to take possession of his body and... soul.

Rob thought his noble deed - rescuing a girl from purgatory - would be a simple matter. But will he be able to resist the charms of the lustful demonesses who use all their wiles and charm to lead him astray?

What will win out in the end: his loyalty or sweet seduction? The trials Rob will go through for love will reveal his true character and willpower. But will his choices be the right ones in this dangerous world?

Discover a world where every encounter can change not only Rob's fate, but also his understanding of love and loyalty.

Game Features:

- Mesmerizing heroines: Each of the demonesses has a unique character and personality, presenting a serious challenge for Rob.

- Atmospheric Locations: Explore a mysterious purgatory filled with danger and temptation, where every decision can lead to unexpected consequences.

- Unpredictable plot: Follow a gripping narrative with unexpected twists and turns as you watch whether Rob can overcome all temptations or succumb to the darkness.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is intended for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains BDSM elements, allusions to sex between different age groups, and domination. All characters depicted in the game are over the age of 18.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Devilish Temptation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: “Devilish Temptation” is a visual novel for adults. Naive but loyal guy Rob goes to purgatory to save his beloved. But the true test is not the murky depths, but seductive demonesses ready to capture his heart and... soul.
